Text:
That was fast, Really looking forward to play it but does anyone know what the hell is wrong with the piratebay tracker or is it just me?
I'm getting "No connection could be made because the target machine actively refused it"
Will the text of the game be in Japanese? As far as I have checked, the game has no plans for a worldwide release...
yeah its all in japanese so its quite hard to understand what they are talking about. Yeah its prob one of those rpgs that wont be released outside J.
Actually, this is a game being shown for release in the US at E3 in a couple days :D Surprise surprise!
Markuf, you are one of my most trusted uploaders, but this game isn't in English, obviously. Thanks though. Seem like it would be an excellent game if I was fluent in Japanese.
i didnt no what this game was until i got it and tried it.  def worth taken a look at when the english comes out.  one to buy
Awesome!!! this game rocks, thank god that I'm fluent in Japanese!
